reviews.review_text: I have used Walmart for as long as I ca n remember and have always been satisfied with their quality and speed. If they are out of an item, they let me know immediately what substitutes are available. I have positive feedback for Walmart and have never been disappointed!

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.review_text: I purchased this for an excellent tip I received and it is perfect. But I have two colors. But this color I have found many new ideas on different places to use it. Win win

reviews.title: Light, smooth, all day coverage.
reviews.review_text: I have used this for years and LOVE the sheer, smooth, matte finish that it leaves on my face (even over a sheer sunscreen). It doesn't clump or create any uneven texture. It goes over concealer evenly and gives my fair skin light coverage that lasts all day.

reviews.title: Maybe throw in a puff next time
reviews.review_text: This powder is smooth and goes on nicely and is great to use. I'm finishing off make up application. I'm happy with the product. I just wish they would throw in a powder puff to go with it!
The texture is very fine so no clumps, my brush just picks up a small amount and it glids on so easy!! the hit of pink give me a fresh look everytime!

reviews.title: Good look for a great price
reviews.review_text: I love this compact. It gives a smooth and natural look to finished make up or a bare face. I bought the Fair/Light for a bit more coverage. I also like the price!

reviews.title: hey
reviews.review_text: I got my order today September 29th 25 the delivery guy was real nice I got all my delivery today all the stuff I ordered
2nd go round for face powder picked out by the shopper. I have medium skin and they picked out sheer. 2 times.product is great if your fIr skinned

reviews.title: Received wrong color
reviews.review_text: i ordered fair/light and received Sheer color shade instead. Did sheet color shade replace fair/light color shade?

reviews.title: Dont waste your money.
reviews.review_text: If you want a very small compact with no applicator %26 finally not be able to even open the compact then this is your product. I wont purchase this again.

reviews.title: Decent but no powder puff
reviews.review_text: Does not include a powder puff. They previously did so that was a disappointment especially if you want to use this on the go and don't have a brush handy. A very small amount of powder is in the compact. Coverage is light and quality is ok.

reviews.title: Arrived broken
reviews.review_text: It arrived cracked and broken, unusable really
Horrible product!!! Used for Les 2 weeks and it's gone!! I would return if I cud for money back!!
It is a quality product that performs exactly the way I want it to. I have found it cheaper elsewhere however

reviews.title: Elf is high quality without high prices,
reviews.review_text: I love E.L.F. cosmetics… great products without expensive glass counter prices. I've loved everything purchased from their line.

reviews.title: GET IT! IT WORKS! Also easy on the wallet :)
reviews.review_text: I was surprised by how much I love this Sheer powder! I quit using my Tarte powder, it kept caking on my face but I use this the same way, over my foundation or concealer and it lasts all day compared to no powder or the more expensive Tarte I had!

reviews.title: Great powder
reviews.review_text: Used it as a setting powder for my eyelids and it seemed to work well -- my eyeshadow stayed put all day despite the heat (I normally have greasy eyelids and eyeshadows melt within hours!).
I liked the weigh that the powder stayed on all day and stay dry

reviews.review_text: Great, good for under eyes. Covers up dark circles.
1 star because of the “caking and darkening of skin after I apply the setting powder.

reviews.title: Will keep using!
reviews.review_text: Works just as well as more expensive powders!
It works great to diminish shine and minimizes my pores.
I ordered a sheer powder this is way too dark for my skin tone and i would like a refund

reviews.title: Light weight
reviews.review_text: Light weight and good coverage. My skin is very sensitive and I normally have break outs from various products. This is the first finishing powder I have and continue to use without break outs. It does not cake on the face and gives a beautiful finished look over my cream foundation.

reviews.title: No applicator!
reviews.review_text: Looks like nice powder, but I can't use it! I've never bought pressed compact powder that didn't come with some kind of powder puff or applicator but this one did NOT! I'll just have to throw it aside until I buy a package of powder puff sponges. No wonder it was so cheap.

This works beautifully as a light base or finishing powder depending on your needs. It isn't the type of powder that cakes or settles into fine lines. I use it daily and it hasnt caused me any irritation or breakouts. I think its a great alternative to liquid foundation.

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.review_text: I love this brand of makeup. I don't wear makeup a lot and it's a great value.

reviews.title: Fav winter use
reviews.review_text: My favorite setting powder during fall/winter when my skin gets dry. Doesn't sink into fine lines or dries me out. Super soft and lasts all day. A little does go a long way

reviews.title: don't recommend.
reviews.review_text: it leaves my concealer looking rough/splotchy. i think it's better to use after foundation you should just put it all over your face or else it looks patchy. not my favorite. but i know maybelline has some really good ones.

reviews.title: Great for oily skin
reviews.review_text: this is a great product for daily touch ups, its easy to use and goes on smooth and soft. The powder is really good for setting any of your makeup, you only need a thin layer to set your makeup and it's effective in combatting shine throughout the day. I found it reduces the LOOK of shine, if halfway y]through the day you feel your face, it will probably FEEL oily it just won't really LOOK oily. It doesn't really diminish the look of fine lines and pores but i guess it makes them look very very slightly smaller. I knocked off one star because this powder is horrible for priming. Do NOT use this BEFORE makeup, it makes your makeup go on patchy and weird, this powder is only really good for setting, the title prime & stay is misleading. overall a good product though, i really like it

reviews.title: No good for my complexion
reviews.review_text: Light to medium is the shade, but the color has way too much yellow in it. I looked sickly and could not use it so they were returned for refund.

reviews.title: e.l.f. Sheer Cosmetic Prime %26 Stay Powder
reviews.review_text: Does not come with applicator is just with clear container for the price of this product i have to say not to bad.

reviews.title: It works
reviews.review_text: It works its just you have to use plenty of it but it's good wish it came with a make up brush something and that it lasts a lil longer
I like this for the inexpensive cost. I don't wear a lot of makeup, so I keep it simple. This works for me.

reviews.title: Setting powder versus powder
reviews.review_text: I wanted the setting powder but they're out of stock so got this instead and it's a very decent replacement

reviews.review_text: I bought this product about 2 WEEKS ago and I'll tell ya it holds my makeup in place surprised even for my oily skin. Very translucent. Great product E.L.F.
A little too powdery but not expensive. Would not buy again

It's a lot bigger than what I expected! Haven't tried it yet but it looks AMAZING!!! 🩵

reviews.review_text: Great size for purse. Takes care of the shine. Covers well. Great price.

reviews.title: love this!
reviews.review_text: love this product! it applys nicely and is inexpensive.

reviews.title: finishing powder
reviews.review_text: my face was very oily within a few hours

reviews.title: Not the correct color
reviews.review_text: The picture doesn't match the color need to get more colors. I was looking for toffee

reviews.title: Big value in a little product!
reviews.review_text: Good color, good staying power.

reviews.title: Perfect match
reviews.review_text: The shade was exactly what we needed. The quality is good and very lightweight finish.
Good finishing. Had no irritation that I often face with cosmetics

reviews.title: Light soft powder.
reviews.review_text: For those asking about the difference between this and the HD powder, there is a huge difference. Being very pale myself, I prefer the HD powder because instead of turning me Gray, it dulls the Orange hues in any face makeup I use. This powder is a softer less silky textured powder. It is much more natural looking. I have extremely oily skin and this hasn't helped Mattify anymore than any other powder but is definitely less candy and feels nice on your skin. Good setting powder although I would be cautious of putting it on dry areas. This powder seems less finely milled or maybe contains less or no silicone than the HD powder. I think it would look chalky on dry skin.

reviews.title: I didn't know what to expect
reviews.review_text: I didn't know what to expect with this or how it would differ from the HD Powder but I am a sucker for anything new. I am very glad I tried it. It is different from the HD Powder and I like it better. I feel like the HD sits on top of my skin whereas this powder isn't visible at all. I have HD in both the white and yellow but I feel like I look like I have rice powder on. I am very fair, mid 40's with average wrinkles and aging. I have used this with and without foundation. I would prefer to not wear foundation but ELF discontinued the mineral line much to my dismay. I am preferring the more natural look of using concealer and this powder and I think I look younger without the heavy makeup. This has no coverage and no color, it just disappears on my face but it gives a more matte finish and makes my face appear smoother. I love being able to put it on throughout the day without ever having to worry about looking chalky or having makeup in my lines. This powder is very soft so beware of dropping it, mine arrived broken but I use it anyway. I apply it with the Ultimate Blending Brush (LOVE!) and it works great. Am buying a few extra to have before they sell out! This works great with foundation and doesn't add any additional color, it also works great without foundation, letting you keep a more natural look without the shine.

reviews.title: Beautiful coverage
reviews.review_text: I love my elf brand cosmetics. My favorite thing about elf, is the price. You get very nice quality makeup for a bargain. This powder provides great coverage that will last all day. What I like about it , is that it gives a natural look, without leaving a buildup on your skin. I put this on after my foundation, and it looks very pretty and natural. I always apply this with a brush, and the nice thing is, is that you don't need to put on a ton to get good coverage. This is a great match for my light to medium skin tone. I would recommend this product.

reviews.title: Not the best but it's ok
reviews.review_text: For the price I don't have complaints really. It doesn't do much for me. I still crease under my eyes and I still get oily throughout the day with this. I use elf complexion brush with this. It's not too dark for the porcelain skin which most elf products are (although it's not exactly light enough for my preference either.) it's fine. No complaints. I still use it everyday. I haven't found a powder that is any better yet lol so why not spend only $2

reviews.title: I bought the translucent
reviews.review_text: I bought the translucent kind and i was a bit disappointed. It didnt keep my makeup in place for long. It crumbled off because the powder was so dry. Good for Oily skin. Not combination skin. It was average price. I wouldnt buy it again for myself.

reviews.title: An Honest and and uncomplicated revue
reviews.review_text: A wonderful light finishing powder (use a sponge for a smooth effect) It is very reasonably priced as are all their products. I am "of a certain age" and don't like a heavy makeup look. Love their brushes and blush too!!

reviews.title: Not good for acne prone skin!!
reviews.review_text: The product is a good product,only if you do not (repeat) DO NOT have acne prone skin,i love a lot of Elf products,though this powder broke me out horribly! Please do not use if you are prone to acne,otherwise its a great powder!

reviews.title: LOVE this powder
reviews.review_text: I've been using this powder for years, and it works well over any cream or liquid products I've applied it to. It never looks cakey. It's a good value for the price!

reviews.title: Contains Talc. Talc=Asbestos
reviews.review_text: Contains Talc. Talc=Asbestos There are so many better, similarly priced alternatives. Not worth the cancer risk.

reviews.title: baby powder white dust
reviews.review_text: Was extremely white and shattered when it slipped out of my makeup bag (when I was seated) so it didn't fall but a few feet and what a mess!

reviews.title: Great quality for only $2.!!!
reviews.review_text: It goes on in a nice translucent way so now I care to buy some foundation

reviews.review_text: Bought this for my daughter it's real light like real white

reviews.title: Great product!
reviews.review_text: The setting is amazing to keep foundation in place until you decide it must go!

reviews.title: Elf Cosmetics
reviews.review_text: Love the price and the quality of this makeup!!

reviews.title: Awesome face powder
reviews.review_text: Great coverage and color , so far my favorite 🤩
